articles.title: eDNA Method: A Powerful Tool to Survey Coral Reefs - AZoCleantech
articles.description: Okinawa Institute of Science and Technology (OIST) scientists have devised a method for measuring coral biodiversity by extracting environmental DNA (eDNA) from a liter of surface seawater sampled above a reef.
